attributes.action: cease the practice of offering migrants British Citizenship
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A right to residence in special cases (highly skilled) only as long as employed is fair all round.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/NSImmigration/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
